sect2.title: Linux Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, nm, objcopy Coreutils: basename, cat, cp, date, expr, ln, md5sum, mkdir, mv, pwd, rm, sort, stty, tail, touch, uname, whoami, yes Findutils: find, xargs Gawk: awk GCC: cc1, collect2, cpp, gcc Grep: grep Gzip: gzip Make: make Modutils: depmod, genksyms Net-tools: dnsdomainname, hostname Sed: sed
